page.title: 15Farming (Page 1)
page.content:
Grillas Farm _____________ This farm is 60 acres in size.They have 100 cattle which are fattened for market.There are 4 cats, 1 dog eighteen laying hens,twenty chicks and three geese.They grow vegetables and flowers.The farmer's wife enjoys knitting, reading,cooking, embroidery,gardening and swimming.
Kiddieo Farm _____________ This farm is 2 acres in size.1acre is used as a flower garden and for fruit trees.They have 3 dogs,2 Shetland ponies,7 cats,3 geese,6ducks, 2 goslings,and 35 chickens.They have 5000 tropical and cold water fish which are sold to the public.The people who live there enjoy gardening and sport on television.
